General.Name: Bindawood Holding Co
General.Description: BinDawood Holding Company engages in retail trading of foodstuff and household items. The company provides information technology and communication; delivery, storage and transportation; and market influencing and digital marketing services. It also involved in the acquiring and managing investments, as well as operates bakeries and restaurants. BinDawood Holding Company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Jeddah, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Al-Madinah Al-Munawarah Road, Jeddah, Saudi Arabia, 21530
